@CUAnschutz @CUDenver U awards:

Lastely and importantly,
For a center grant, you're working with a lot of colleagues on this; make sure you have a healthy working relationship with them!

What are your thoughts about U grants?

(7/7)

@CUAnschutz @CUDenver U awards: 

When I write a nontypical grant, I very carefully read and use language from the RFA.

For this RFA, the data analysis core was responsible for power, data management, and data analysis.  So aims were (1) study design, (2) data management, (3) data analysis  

(5/)

I recently submitted a U2C with amazing colleagues at @CUAnschutz @CUDenver 

This mechanism was for a center that included 4 cores. I was the Data Analysis Core PI. 

Overall application was huge!
-6 pages for each core
-6 pages for project
-12 pages for overall center

(4/)
